attributes.action: Fine pet owners when their pets excrete on the streets!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is absolutely pathetic, today and not just today have I stepped in dog waste!
I am urging the government to do something about this, pet owners don't clean up the waste their pets excrete, and people's shoes are being ruined, now I have to buy new shoes, and it's not the first time. Those shoes were really expensive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
